# Gist

Blogdown accepts .md or .rmd files, write as though it's any other .rmd file. Keep in mind the [cheatsheet](https://www.rstudio.com/wp-content/uploads/2015/02/rmarkdown-cheatsheet.pdf) and your favorite .rmd settings.
